images.caption: Figure 1:Gallery of HiFlow.The proposed HiFlow enables pre-trained text-to-image diffusion models (Flux.1.0-dev in this figure) to synthesize high-resolution images with high fidelity and rich details in a training-free manner. Best view zoomed in.
Figure 2:T2I models suffer significant quality degradation in high-resolution generation.
